ISSUE.TITLE: set management.endpoint.flowable.enabled=true does not work
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** I am new guy to flowable. Recently I had followed the [document](https://flowable.com/open-source/docs/bpmn/ch05a-Spring-Boot/#flowable-actuator-endpoints) to write an example. When I added the `management.endpoint.flowable.enabled=true` to my configuration file, I got a "404" message. But when I use `management.endpoints.web.exposure.include=*`, it worked. **Expected behavior** Got message below: ``` { "completedTaskCountToday": 0, "deployedProcessDefinitions": [ "oneTaskProcess (v1)", "oneTaskProcess (v2)", "oneTaskProcess (v3)" ], "processDefinitionCount": 3, "cachedProcessDefinitionCount": 0, "runningProcessInstanceCount": { "oneTaskProcess (v1)": 0, "oneTaskProcess (v2)": 0, "oneTaskProcess (v3)": 1 }, "completedTaskCount": 0, "completedActivities": 2, "completedProcessInstanceCount": { "oneTaskProcess (v1)": 0, "oneTaskProcess (v2)": 0, "oneTaskProcess (v3)": 0 }, "openTaskCount": 1 } ``` **Code** simply add `management.endpoint.flowable.enabled=true` to my configuration file. You can see the whole code at [here](https://github.com/FadeDemo/FlowableDemo/tree/main/spring-boot) **Additional context** The version of flowable is `6.7.0` * `flowable-spring-boot-starter` * `flowable-spring-boot-starter-actuator`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Make sure that bytes from variables and historic details are deleted correctly

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3066 add the determiner "the" before the word "web"

Update actuator doc and user guide (#3077) * #3066 update ch05a-Spring-Boot.md * #3066 update ch05a-Spring-Boot.adoc * #3066 improve the rigor * #3066 fix adoc zh_CN link * #3066 add the determiner "the" before the word "web" * #3066 change "eg" to "e.g."
